Text:
This is amazing roots retro-futuristic folk music by the musical genius who gave the world Goober and the Peas: Dan Miller, who also landed a role in the Johnny Cash bio-pic "Walk The Line". A hometown Detroit boy.
Favorite line from Superstition: "Don't you know its bad luck to be superstitious." Thanks for this and all you do. Hope this is seeded so I can upgrade my mp3 version. Would love to see "Little Amber Bottles" too.
